person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 10 equal .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| 10 equal |

Note: I'm assuming there is a mistake in the paragraph and "10 equal" is meant to be "Ten equals". If that's the case, the paragraph should read:

Let's think step by step.

Ten equals the number of people in the room.

The valid Person entity in this corrected paragraph would be:

| Person |
| --- |
| Ten |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 10 equal .

Let's think step by step.

| Location |
| --- |
| 10 Downing Street |
| Munich |
| Germany |

The entities were identified as follows:

1. "10 Downing Street" - a street in London, England, which is the official residence and office of the British Prime Minister.
2. "Munich" - a city in Germany.
3. "Germany" - a country in Central Europe.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location |
| --- |
| 10 Downing Street |

The only valid location entity in the paragraph is:

1. "10 Downing Street" - a street in London, England, which is the official residence and office of the British Prime Minister.

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, "Munich" and "Germany", do not clearly refer to a "Location" and were therefore not included in the table.

| EBRD (European Bank for Reconstruction and Development) |

| IsDB (Islamic Development Bank) |

I have removed the entity "G20" as it is not an organization but a group of countries. The remaining entities are all organizations.
